content.text: It's been a long day, I'm headed home to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos!
Sounds delicious! I love tacos. I just got back from getting my hair dyed a new color.
Oh that's cool! What color did you get?
I got it dyed a hot pink! I'm not sure how I feel about it yet.
I think it sounds really cool! I love pink hair.
Thanks! I love to dye my hair different colors on the weekends. It's like my own personal art project.
That's so cool! I wish I had the confidence to do that.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will! I'm not sure I'm brave enough to try pink hair though.
You should! It's really fun and you could always change it back if you don't like it.
Maybe I will! I'm going to have to think about it.
Sounds good! I'm sure it would look great on you.
You're welcome! I'm always here to help people feel good about themselves.
